name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John B. MACKNEER, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John B. MACKNEER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Thomas M. Torquato, Reedsville, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
402 A.2d 660
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John B. MACKNEER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 21, 1979.
Decided June 22, 1979.
Thomas M. Torquato, Reedsville, for appellant.
Richard M. Mohler, Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
